verbose_text: Maison et al. found that GH treatment in GHD significantly reduced C-LDL [-0.5 (SD 0.3) mmol / liter], C-TOT [-0.3 (SD 0.3) mmol / liter], fat mass [-3.1 (SD 3.3) kg], diastolic BP [-1.8 (SD 3.8) mmHg] and significantly increased FFM [+2.8 (SD 2.7) kg], fasting plasma glucose [+ 0.2 (SD 0.1) mM/L], and insulin [+8.7 (SD 7.0) pM/L] [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: GH treatment in GHD significantly reduced C-LDL [-0.5 (SD 0.3) mmol/liter], C-TOT [-0.3 (SD 0.3) mmol/liter], fat mass [-3.1 (SD 3.3) kg], diastolic BP
